class.name: CurveMesh
class.brief_description: Generates a deformed mesh along a 3D curve.
class.description: CurveMesh allows you to deform a base mesh along a 3D Curve. This is useful for creating tubes, cables, rails, or any geometry that follows a path in 3D space. You must provide a base mesh and define start/end control points to generate a smooth curve.

method.name: init
method.description: Initializes the CurveMesh with a base mesh and sets whether the curve should be cubic or linear.

method.name: create_curve_mesh
method.description: Creates and returns a new mesh deformed along a generated curve defined by the given parameters. This method builds a temporary curve segment between the start and end points and deforms the base mesh to follow it.
